about_the_game:
Soren lives in 2208, in a post-apocalyptic Egypt governed by the City-State of New Cairo.

Afflicted with a rare mutation that prevents him from controlling his emotions, he is forced to wear a high-tech implant to store them and must live with his family in the lowest class, where those who threaten the balance of society are placed.

One day, he is offered the unique opportunity to join the upper class in exchange for 7 mysterious Gems hidden in the heart of the desert.

Along his journey through the desert, he will discover the exceptional abilities unleashed by the release of his four primary emotions: fear, anger, sadness, and joy.

EMOTIONS AT THE HEART OF GAMEPLAY


  • Experience a unique gameplay that places emotions at the core.
  • Unlock emotion combos and elevate real-time strategic combat to another level.
  • Battle powerful enemies and influence their behavior.
  • Explore the secrets of a hostile and complex world, from unique villages to ruins of the past and endless dunes.

FIND 7 MYSTERIOUS GEMS AND UNLOCK NEW ABILITIES


  • Meet the inhabitants of 3 factions, and discover their complex and nuanced personalities.
  • Find the 7 Solarite Gems, hidden in the desert to conceal a heavy past.
  • Use these stones to enhance your implant and unlock new abilities.

A DISTINCTIVE VISUAL STYLE


  • A distinctive stylized aesthetic, blending 3D and illustration.

WHAT LOST IN CAIRO IS NOT


  • It is not a game about Ancient Egypt; the story unfolds in 2208.
  • It is not a game with "grocery list" quests to artificially extend its lifespan.
  • It is not an open-world game as vast as a AAA title.
  • It is not a 100-hour game; we prioritize a rich but more condensed experience.

short_description: An open-world isometric action-adventure game. Play as Soren on his journey through the desert to retrieve 7 mysterious gems. Learn to master your emotions while fighting dreadful robots and exploring the many secrets of a post-apocalyptic futuristic Egypt.
